attributes.action: Reduce price and expand range of women’s work wear
attributes.additional_details:
I want the government or parliament to do something about this because as a female in male dominated environments we deal with sexist comments and actions every day, it’s hard to find work wear that fits and be a decent price, where as men’s wear fits them and is a reasonable price! 
I as a midsize women struggle to find fitting women’s work wear at a decent price! 
We get paid less then men! 
RESPECT US AND OUR JOBS!
attributes.background: I want the government to except the fact women are now in “male’ dominated trade such as myself! I want them to lower the price and expend the range of women’s work wear.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for setting the prices of clothing.
